Flammable Duck.xyz

Home Contact About

A few days ago I saw someone on reddit who made a cli business card. I thought it was pretty cool, so I decided to give it a go. You can see my card by running the command curl -sl flammableduck.xyz/card You can make your own by creating a text file and uploading it to your website. Use ANSI escape sequences to make the text colored!
